data.name: Just another Jump And Run
data.detailed_description:
With its different and varied levels, different enemy types and simple but appealing graphic style, "Just another Jump and Run" offers the fun you need and deserve after a hard day at work or at school.

Level

Already at the release the game contains different levels of different difficulty and length. These are unlocked after completing the previous level and can be played solo or in multiplayer. Of course, more levels will be released after the release.

Opponent

The opponents who stand in the way of the player provide even more challenge. With their different attacks and movement patterns, they also provide variety.

data.short_description: Play this classic timed platformer alone or with friends and try to place your best times as high as possible on the leaderboard.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
